mapper.update: update feed set media_url = #{mediaUrl}, username = #{username}, caption = #{caption}, feed_time = #{feedTime} where feed_id = #{feedId};
mapper.select: select feed_id from feed where feed_id = #{feedId};
select * from feed where user_id = #{userId} order by feed_time desc;
select count(*) as feed_cnt from feed where user_id = #{userId};
select feed_time, count(*) as count from feed where user_id = #{userId} group by feed_time;
select count(*) from (select f.* from feed as f join party_member as pm on f.user_id = pm.user_id where pm.party_id = #{partyId} and f.feed_time >= #{today}) as pmf;
select count(distinct user_id) from (select f.* from feed as f join party_member as pm on f.user_id = pm.user_id where pm.party_id = #{partyId} and f.feed_time >= #{attendanceDate}) as pmf;
